options.javascript:
<script>
    function getParsedFullDate(dateString) {
    
    	var regex = /(\d\d\/\d\d\/\d\d\d\d) (\d\d:\d\d) - (\d\d:\d\d)/gm; //partial date
    	var m;
    
    	while ((m = regex.exec(dateString)) !== null) {
    		// This is necessary to avoid infinite loops with zero-width matches
    		if (m.index === regex.lastIndex) {
    			regex.lastIndex++;
    		}
    
    		fullMatch = m[0];
    		date = m[1];
    		startHour = m[2];
    		endHour = m[3];
    
    		dateString = date+' '+startHour+' - '+date+' '+endHour;
    	  
    	}
    	
    	
    	if (! isFullDate(dateString)) {
    	    console.log('fulld')
    		return null;
    	}
    
    	return parseDateString(dateString);
    	
    }
    
    function isFullDate(dateString) { 
      
      return (parseDateString(dateString)) ? true : false;
    }
    
    function parseDateString(dateString)
    {  
    	var regex = /(\d\d\/\d\d\/\d\d\d\d \d\d:\d\d) - (\d\d\/\d\d\/\d\d\d\d \d\d:\d\d)/gm; //full date
    	var m;
      
    	if ((m = regex.exec(dateString)) !== null) {
    		// This is necessary to avoid infinite loops with zero-width matches
    		if (m.index === regex.lastIndex) {
    			regex.lastIndex++;
    		}
    	  
    		fullMatch = m[0];
    		
    	  var startDate = formatParseDateString(m[1]);
    	  var endDate = formatParseDateString(m[2]);
    	  
    		return [Date.parse(startDate), Date.parse(endDate)];
    	  
    	}
    	
      return false;
      
    }
      
    function formatParseDateString(dateString)
    {
    	var dayAndHour = dateString.split(' ');
    	var ddmmyyDate = dayAndHour[0];
    	var hourDate = dayAndHour[1];
    	var ddmmyyDateSplit = ddmmyyDate.split('/');
    	return ddmmyyDateSplit[2]+"/"+ddmmyyDateSplit[1]+"/"+ddmmyyDateSplit[0]+" "+hourDate;
    }
    
    function compareMilliseconds(a, b)
    {
    	 return ((a < b) ? -1 : ((a > b) ? 1 : 0));
    }

    function onLoadFunction()
    {
        console.log("loaded");
        
        jQuery.extend(jQuery.fn.dataTableExt.oSort, {
    		"extract-date-pre": function (value){
    		   return getParsedFullDate(value);
    		},
    		"extract-date-asc": function (a, b) {
    			var aStart = a[0];
    			var aEnd = a[1];
    			var bStart = b[0];
    			var bEnd = b[1];
    			startCompared = compareMilliseconds(aStart, bStart);
    							
    		  
    		  if (startCompared != 0) {
    				return startCompared;
    			}
    			return compareMilliseconds(aEnd, bEnd);
    		  
    		},
    		"extract-date-desc": function (a, b) {
    			var aStart = a[0];
    			var aEnd = a[1];
    			var bStart = b[0];
    			var bEnd = b[1];
    			startCompared = compareMilliseconds(aStart, bStart)*-1;
    			if (startCompared != 0) {
    				return startCompared;
    			}
    			return compareMilliseconds(aEnd, bEnd)*-1;
    		}
    	});
        
    	$('#example1').DataTable({
    	  'pageLength'      : 25,
    	  columnDefs: [{targets:"dateSort", type:"extract-date"}]
    	});
    	
    	
    	
    	
    	
    	$('.datepicker').each(function( index ) {
    
    		$(this).unbind('change');
    		var params = {
    			format: $(this).attr('data-date-format'),
    			todayBtn: true,
    			weekStart: $(this).attr('data-week-start'),
    			daysOfWeekHighlighted: $(this).attr('data-days-of-week-highlighted'),
    			daysOfWeekDisabled: $(this).attr('data-days-of-week-disabled'),
    			todayHighlight: $(this).attr('data-today-highlight')
    		}
    
    		if($(this).attr('data-multidate') && $(this).attr('data-multidate') != 'false'){
    			params.multidate = true;
    		}
    
    		$(this).datepicker(params)
    	});
    }

    //
    window.addEventListener ? 
    window.addEventListener("load",onLoadFunction,false) : 
    window.attachEvent && window.attachEvent("onload",onLoadFunction);
    
</script>
